duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform automotive detailing, including washing, waxing, and interior cleaning.
Work efficiently to meet production targets and maintain a high level of quality in detailing work.
Adapt to flexible scheduling, including 4 or 5 day work weeks, as required.
Pay close attention to detail to ensure the highest standard of automotive detailing.
Communicate effectively with team members and supervisors to coordinate tasks and achieve production goals.
Demonstrate reliability in fulfilling work responsibilities and meeting scheduling requirements.
